P

Patch - Record Class in fr.uge.patchwork
A record representing a patch with the number of buttons it contains, its price, the number of steps to take on the time board, its height, its width and its shape

Creates an instance of a Patch record class.

play_game(ApplicationContext, SimpleGameData) - Method in interface fr.uge.patchwork.GameView
Goes once in the game loop, which consists in retrieving user actions, transmissing it to the GameView and GameData, and dealing with time events.
